content: {A思考}Back then, only the toughest survived, moo. It wasn't until I left that I realized how many things are fragile and need plenty of care. Now, I'm learning how to nurture the delicate ones, moo.

content: I just finished watering the plants at home and was thinking of giving them another bucket of water. Back when I was little, every plant I saw was tough — they endured droughts and the cold, surviving an entire winter without rain, moo, and they still thrived.
